events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position in our development team, and it is currently under review.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on your skills and background in software development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process for the engineering role, and will reach out shortly.
Your initial screening interview focusing on your software engineering experience was successfully completed with positive feedback.
Thank you for promptly responding and confirming your availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th, where you will discuss coding challenges and problem-solving techniques.
The technical interview was completed successfully, and the panel was impressed with your coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
Your HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your career goals, culture fit, and benefits package.
Your HR interview was completed with positive remarks regarding your alignment with company values and team culture.
An offer has been formally proposed for the Software Engineer position, including details about salary, benefits, and start date.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your enthusiasm about joining the development team.
You have officially accepted our offer, and we are excited to welcome you on board as a Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started, including orientation and setup for your role as part of the engineering team.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, and you are officially a new member of our software engineering team.
